name: The Suitcase Kid Quiz | Kid Lit Authors L - Z | 10 Questions

questions.text: Katie is older than Andy by how many days?
questions.explanation:
five.

	Andrea hates her half siblings but she hates Katie the most. Katie is all sweet and sugary when adults are there- she's five days older than Andy and she acts like she's seven because she's small.

questions.text: What did Andrea want to name the new baby?
questions.explanation:
Ethel.

	She wanted to name her Ethel after a mean aunt who stamped her big feet and yelled at everyone. But in the last chapter, 'Z is for Zoe' she called her half-sister Zoe.

Andy Pandy.

	Andy hated that name. She was named after one of Katie's videos, the 'Watch with your Mum' one.

questions.text: Aileen and Andy were best friends.
questions.explanation:
true.

	Then Aileen started hanging out with Fiona. Andy grew jealous.

questions.text: What does Andy call her un-Uncle Bill?
questions.explanation:
baboon.

	She tries to avoid him from as far as possible. She secretly calls him the baboon because he's hairy. Her Mum met Bill when he came to paint the staircase at Mulberry Cottage.

Radish.

	Radish is her mascot. Andy drops Radish under a tree and the last chapters were about finding her.

10.

	Most of Jacqueline Wilson's characters are 9 or 10.

Paula.

	Paula gave it to her. 'I look super with it on. Katie's smeared a whole lot on her too but she just looks like a little kid with face paints. Poor old Katie.'

questions.text: Does Andy have any of her own siblings (not halves)?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Andy has six HALF-Siblings. She's really an only child well, with Radish...

Zoe.

	Zoe is Andy's favorite sister. She's Carrie's child.
